Name: Element X
About the game: Gameplay Switch between 3 unique elements: Energy - auto targets enemies and can be upgraded to synergize with the other elements. Fire - applies burn which damage over time and an area of effect. Ice - applies freeze which slows enemy movement and attack speed. Use powerful abilities: Slow Time - improve reaction time and graze between enemy projectiles. Teleport - dash out of impossible situations. Bullet Clear - life saving ultimate that destroys all enemy projectiles. Features Roguelite bullet hell. Arcade style competitive scoring. Global, friends, and personal leaderboards. Randomly generated maps in every play through. Procedurally generated bosses and attack patterns. 100+ different upgrades to craft your own play style. Variety of skin and UI cosmetics. 20+ unlockable perks.
